title: The Rest of the Best and More
description: This is a collection of the rest of the most-asked-for favorites from the complete collection of Best of Bridge cookbooks...plus over 100 new recipes!The acclaimed Best of Bridge cookbook series has become an international phenomenon, selling millions of copies to busy homemakers and entertainers who have tried and tested recipes with tasty results. This book offers tantalizing dishes created from readily available ingredients.
author: Best of Bridge
